function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","Impact":"Increased contact with others and hindered compliance with COVID-19 mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Implement eviction moratoria and housing stabilization measures","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Individuals facing eviction and housing instability","Owner":"Government and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Transiency and overcrowding facilitate COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 through direct and indirect contact, inhalation of infectious droplets, and aerosols","Mitigation":"Enhance ventilation in indoor environments, enforce social distancing and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems","People":"People living in overcrowded and poorly ventilated indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, landlords, and public health authorities"}]}
